text: aur usaka zinda hona dushvaar ho vah bhee zarur zinda ho gaee to ye log anaqareeb hee tum se poochhegen bhala hamen dobaara kaun zinda karega tum kah do ki vahee (khuda) jisane tumako pahalee marataba paida kiya (jab tum kuchh na the) is par ye log tumhaare saamane apane sar matakaengen aur kahegen (achchha agar hoga) to aakhir kab tum kah do ki bahut jald anaqareeb hee hoga
